â€¡title=I am Really Happy for You My Dearâ€¡See, good things happen to good people. I'm happy for you my dear.
â€¡title=I'm really happy for you.â€¡
â€¡title=There is enough sun for everybody.â€¡I cheer for people. I was raised to believe there's enough sun for everybody.
â€¡title=I always wish for your happinessâ€¡You should always know I wish for your happiness even without me.
â€¡title=I am your well wisher.â€¡Never do the Envy, Jealousy or insecure stuff. Be the hustler, the well wisher, the go better!
â€¡title=Be happy for others, because life is not a competition.â€¡Call me crazy, but I love to see people happy and succeeding. Life is a journey, not a competition!
â€¡title=I am happy for your achievements.â€¡Success may come and go away, but your achievements will stay. I AM REALLY HAPPY FOR YOU!

â€¡title=Those who are not happy for you are not even happy for themselves.â€¡Don't worry about the people who aren't happy for you. They probably aren't happy for themselves, either.
I am happy for you.
â€¡title=I am happy and proud of your successâ€¡Success comes only to those who believe in themselves and are prepared to win. I AM REALLY HAPPY FOR YOUR SUCCESS!

â€¡title=We should live a positive life and always be happy for others as these happy moments are priceless.â€¡Luck is an amazing thing, but not many people have it, so today I want to wish you lots of it.
I AM REALLY HAPPY FOR YOU!

But always remember that I am happy for you.
